more.requirement: Good at English Friendly, hard working, motivative
more.description: Order Introduce Foods & Drinks to customer Serve Foods & Drinks Verify food' s quality before serving Clean up tables & set up Answer all the questions of customers Follow Restaurant Manager's direction
more.benefit: 1. High salary 2. Professional environment where you can touch high level service 3. English is the communication language in our restaurant so the fantastic chance for you to improve your English skills. 4. Be trained before working 5.Good promotion
more.keyword: Giao tiếp hiệu quả,Kỹ năng chăm sóc khách hàng,Kỹ năng giải quyết tình huống,Tập trung trong công việc,Chịu được áp lực công việc,Trung thực,Tự tin,Tinh thần làm việc nhóm,Nhiệt tình
